authors.name: Meredith Broussard
authors.affiliation: NYU Arthur L. Carter Journalism Institute

authors.name: Vicky Steeves
authors.affiliation: NYU Libraries & Center for Data Science

title: Saving Data Journalism
description: The presentation discusses the problem of archiving interactive news stories and introduces a solution using an emulation-based web archiving tool called ReproZip. This tool helps to capture and preserve dynamic elements of news apps, making them accessible for future use.
